<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82252</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82252</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4688</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mole's Law, Avogadros Law and Avogadros Number</string>
            <string language="es">Ley de las moléculas, Ley de Avogadro y el número de avogadros</string>
            <string language="ga">Dlí Mole, Dlí Avogadros agus Uimhir Avogadros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz der Mole, Avogadros Gesetz und Avogadros 
Zahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La loi de la taupe, la loi d'Avogadros et le nombre
d'Avogadros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei da toupeira, lei de Avogadros e número de 
Avogadros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge della talpa, legge di Avogadros e numero di 
Avogadros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος τυφλοπόντικα, νόμος Avogadros και αριθμός 
Avogadros</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Series of sample answers for questions relating to the topics of relative molecular mass, volume of gas at S.T.P. and Avogadro's number.</string>
            <string language="es">Serie de respuestas que sirven como muestra para preguntas relacionadas con los temas de la masa molecular relativa. Volumen de gas en S.T.P y el número de Avogadro.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sraith freagraí samplacha ar cheisteanna maidir le mais mhóilíneach choibhneasta, toirt gáis ag S.T.P. agus uimhir Avogadros.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química. Ejemplo con demostraciones</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worked Example</string>
            <string language="ga">Sampla Oibrithe</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihe Beispielantworten für die Fragen in bezug 
auf sind die Themen der relativen molekularen Masse, Datenträger Gas 
an S.T.P. und Zahl Avogadros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Série de réponses d'échantillon pour des 
questions concernant les sujets de la masse moléculaire relative, 
volume de gaz à S.T.P. et nombre d'Avogadro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Série de respostas da amostra para as perguntas 
que relacionam-se aos tópicos da massa molecular relativa, do volume 
do gás em S.T.P. e do número de Avogadro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Serie di risposte del campione per le domande 
concernenti i soggetti di massa molecolare relativa, volume di gas a 
S.T.P. e numero del Avogadro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σειρά απαντήσεων δειγμάτων για τις ερωτήσεις σχετικά 
με τα θέματα της σχετικής μοριακής μάζας, την ένταση του ήχου 
αέριο σε S.T.P. και τον αριθμό Avogadro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bearbeitetes Beispiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exemple Travaillé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exemplo Trabalhado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esempio Funzionato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασμένο παράδειγμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
